fields.description:
Trying to set up a new VB and receiving this error in the cloud-debug.log. 

The euca-configure-vmware command successfully discovered both ESXi hosts via vCenter but no resources being reported.

{code}

{code}

VMWare vCenter is 5.1 update 1 and the ESXi hosts are 5.0 update 2.

We believe this to be related in some way or the other to BROKER-17
fields.summary: ESXi host added successfully, but resources aren't showing up
fields.environment:
*non-HA, multi-cluster*

* 1 x CLC, Walrus, AS, CW, LB
* 1 x CC, SC
* 1 x CC, VMwareBroker, SC

comments.body: BROKER-36 covers the issue with using different VMWare versions (vCenter and ESXi).  This has been patched and is in QA.  Regarding using multi-cluster setup where one cluster is KVM and the other is VMware, we will need to create a feature request that can be prioritized (EUCA-7002)

Tickets raised from this issue:

* BROKER-17 - covers resources not started by Eucalyptus on VMware
* BROKER-36 - covers situation where vCenter and ESXi nodes do not match in version.
* EUCA-7002 - feature request for support multi-cluster with different hypervisor support for each cluster.
